http://mypowerblogging.com/3rd-birthday-80020321-problem-fix/

If you are having a problem like this "Game Could Not Be Started....80020321". Maybe you could try this http://mypowerblogging.com/3rd-birthday-80020321-problem-fix/. I've used it to play The 3rd Birthday.

thanks for the info Vakura, and thats what i did for all other games to work on my psp, i started with 5.03 gen-c, then 5.03 prom, now im using 5.03 prom-3 yup works almost all other games(luv aya brea) unfortunately still having prob with Gods Eater Burst...
the last thing i can tell you to try is to put 5.50 prome 4 i see no other way

I had Gen 5.50 d3, and updated to 5.50 prometheus 4, and it worked. Prometheus lets you play 6.20 and latest games versions without updating to later versions :P

Tnks Vakura great Release :D
